---
title: "Airline Codes"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_airline_codes"
```

```{r}
codes <- read_html(url)
```

```{r}
airline_codes <- codes %>% 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
```

```{r}
write_csv(airline_codes[[1]], "data/airline-codes.csv")
```
